mapper.select: select * from tb_bbs where ctgry=#{ctgry} order by bbs_no desc
select * from tb_bbs where bbs_no=(select max(bbs_no) from tb_bbs where ctgry=#{ctgry})
mapper.insert: insert into tb_bbs values( tb_bbs_no.nextval, #{sj},#{cn}, 0,#{ctgry}, sysdate,#{ncnm}, #{videosrc},0)
mapper.update: update tb_bbs set sj=#{sj},cn=#{cn},videosrc=#{videosrc} where bbs_no=#{bbs_no}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from (select * from tb_bbs where ctgry='자유게시판' or ctgry='가입인사' or ctgry='리뷰' order by bbs_no desc)a)b where rnum >=#{start} and rnum <=#{end}
select count(*) from tb_bbs where ctgry='자유게시판' or ctgry='가입인사' or ctgry='리뷰'
